title: Placeholder or Invalid Resource Names
summary: Recover quickly when commands include placeholders ([pod-name], <namespace>) or return NotFound due to wrong names.
quick_fix: Run FIND_ISSUES or LIST_ALL <kind> to get real names, then rerun DESCRIBE/GET_LOGS with <ns>/<name>.
symptoms: Tool output says arguments contain placeholders
Investigation stops before running real tools
diagnostics: LIST_ALL Pod/Deployment/Service to enumerate resources and namespaces
FIND_ISSUES to list unhealthy resources with real names
Avoid copying doc placeholders; always substitute actual names

common_causes.fix: Discover names via LIST_ALL/FIND_ISSUES; rerun commands with actual ns/name.

common_causes.description: Resource exists elsewhere or is a different kind.
common_causes.fix: Check namespaces; list by kind; use correct <kind> <ns> <name>.
List current resources and target the live ones.

investigation_flow: 1) LIST_ALL Pod (or relevant kind) to collect <ns>/<name>.
4) If still NotFound, verify namespace/kind; refresh LIST_ALL.
